content: give a spring touch to the classic granny square by adding this pretty flower to your designs thanks to its versatility you can use it on tops jackets pants bags hats blankets and thousands of other garments combine and try different colors on each round and get the granny square in the shade you like the most the pattern consists of written instructions and visual diagrams of the granny square detailed schematically on each row suggested yarn cotton yarn weight uk 4 ply - us 2 fine crochet hook according to the chosen yarn size the measurement of the granny can change depending on the yarn and the crochet hook the photographed model is worked with a 3 0mm crochet hook and measures 10 x 10 cm
